children.subject: <md>Yes, we have break out rooms where you can talk to an advisor one on one.</md>
Will there be an opportunity to ask questions 1 on 1 with an advisor during drop in hours? Or, is it recommended to schedule an appointment to do that?

history.content:
Hi everyone, we hope your Spring semester is starting off well. Starting Feb 2nd we are adding some additional hours to our Weds virtual drop in times: 10am - noon / 2-4pm Feel free to drop in to ask questions. Please remember too that there are MANY things you can more quickly email us about, that don't need an appointment or even to drop in-such as questions about APR, or forms such as double major paperwork. We can review and assist you with this by writing to: cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu. We aim for prompt responses.
https://eecs.berkeley.edu/resources/undergrads/cs/advising
history.subject: From Advising:  CS advising adding additional virtual drop-in hours on Wednesdays
